NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
DAZ: Friends, Cassava and I write to you from Lovers' Cove. We eagerly await any update - how did the test of the <color=orange>Deep Storm Station</color> today go?
2
1
YARROW: It is good to hear from you, my friends. But, I am afraid our goal, though closer than ever, is not yet within reach.
3 2
YARROW: But regardless, we should not be negative on such a joyous day..
4 3
YARROW: How did your plan to propose to Cassava during the negative time interval fare, Daz? All of us in the <color=orange>Deep Storm Station</color> have been waiting anxiously to learn his answer!
5
4
CASSAVA: Wait a second! Was that how Daz was able to know my answer before I gave it?! For what purpose would he...
6
4
DAZ: He said yes! We are engaged, everybody! We are engaged!!
7
5
DAZ: Well, I.. I was afraid of the possibility you might feel differently.. That's why I.. wanted to see 3 seconds into the future of my proposal..
8
7
Cassava: Daz, you mean the world to me.. There was no possibility of any other answer. But to have had a time-traveling marriage... How many in existence could lay claim to that?!
9
8
Cassava: You have until the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> is ready to craft an even grander marriage proposal to Clary, Yarrow!
10
9
Yarrow: Our romantic relationship has only recently begun! You know weâ€™re nowhere ready for that!!
Cove EX3 7
CONV R2 7
